hero.heading: Integrate inbox, calendar and meetings into your app
hero.text: Nylas is the API that lets you integrate with Gmail, Microsoft, IMAP, Zoom, and 250+ mail, calendar and meeting providers in 5 minutes.

codeSnippets.title: Send an Email on behalf of your user

snippets.code:
require 'nylas'

nylas = Nylas::Client.new(api_key: "<NYLAS_API_KEY>")

request_body = {
  subject: '<EMAIL_SUBJECT>',
  body: '<EMAIL_BODY>',
  to: [{ name: '<RECIPIENT_NAME>', email: '<RECIPIENT_EMAIL>' }]
}

email, response = nylas.messages.send('<USER_GRANT_ID>', request_body)

from nylas import Client
nylas = Client(api_key='<NYLAS_API_KEY>')
message = nylas.messages.send(
    '<USER_GRANT_ID>',
    request_body={
        "to": [{ "name": '<RECIPIENT_NAME>', 
        "email": '<RECIPIENT_EMAIL>' }],
        "subject": '<EMAIL_SUBJECT>',
        "body": '<EMAIL_BODY>'
    }
)

import com.nylas.NylasClient
val nylas = NylasClient(apiKey = '<NYLAS_API_KEY>')

val recipients = listOf(EmailName('<RECIPIENT_EMAIL>', '<RECIPIENT_NAME>'))

val requestBody = SendMessageRequest.Builder(recipients)
    .subject('<EMAIL_SUBJECT>')
    .body('<EMAIL_BODY>')
    .build()

val emailResponse = nylas.messages().send('<USER_GRANT_ID>', requestBody)

meetnylas.heading: Meet Nylas
meetnylas.title: A developer-first solution for custom communication experiences
meetnylas.text: Securely integrate with every email, calendar, and contacts provider using a single interface to streamline your users’ workflows. Build real-time, bi-directional communications in your app up to 40x faster, saving months of development time.

nylasapi.title: Email API
nylasapi.text: Sync, send, and receive messages to build contextual email, automated outreach, and other in-app experiences.
nylasapi.caption: Explore the Email API

nylasapi.title: Calendar API
nylasapi.text: Retrieve and manage calendars and events to build scheduling automation, calendar management, and other scheduling experiences.
nylasapi.caption: Explore the Calendar API

nylasapi.title: Notetaker API
nylasapi.text: Join, record, and transcribe meetings across platforms to build AI-powered meeting and notes experiences.
nylasapi.caption: Explore the Notetaker API
